tab1.title: Try clothes on your photo
tab1.description:
No need to actually wear the clothes—
freely test out many styles.

tab2.title: Swipe to filter your favorites
tab2.description:
Swipe images left or right
and quickly surface outfits you like.

tab3.title: Find clothes that suit you
tab3.description:
Try plenty of options
and discover your perfect look.

name.title: Enter your name
name.description: This name will be visible to other users. You can change it later.
name.label: Username
name.too_short_error: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
name.too_long_error: Username must be 24 characters or less.

gender.description: This will be used to recommend clothing. You can change it later.

intro.title: Upload your Full-Body Photo
intro.description: This full-body photo of you to try on clothes.
intro.note: You can change the photo later.

tab1.title: Keep the background simple
tab1.description:
Shoot in a place
with a simple background.

tab2.title: Stay within the frame
tab2.description:

shown on the screen.

tab3.title: Use the self-timer
tab3.description:
Set your phone upright and take the photo
using the self-timer.
